replies.body: I needs me about tree fiddy
We don't really have free stuff like RP as a giveaway.  How much were you looking for?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qm3ZpwEz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T17:43:16.811+0000)
>
> We don't really have free stuff like RP as a giveaway.  How much were you looking for?

Isn't telling someone you dont give away free RP and then asking how much free RP they want condradictory?
Not necessarily.  We don't have RP giveaways.  We do like to review each case individually, and see if and how we can help another player out.  :)
